tool_description: This API returns the latest news about cryptocurrencies from around the world
name: Latest Crypto News
title: Latest Crypto News

api_list.name: Get the latest crypto news from one source
api_list.description: Get  the latest crypto news from one news source

api_list.name: Get latest crypto news
api_list.description: Get a list of the latest news on cryptocurrency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-crypto-news1.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-crypto-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-crypto-news1.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-crypto-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
